short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables you to export your whatsapp group contacts into csv file for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to download the whatsapp group contacts into a csv file without any registration or monthly fees.
You can export all the contacts in any whatsapp group. A CSV file will be downloaded with the group name.
For this, you need to follow below steps
1. Open web whatsapp.
2. Login to your account in web whatsapp.
3. Once web whatsapp is loaded, click the group whose contacts you want to export on the left pane.
4. Once the group loads on the right pane, then click the group name once again to open group info.
5. When the group info loads, then click on the extension. 
6. Your CSV file with all the group contacts will be downloaded automatically with the groups name.
7. This extension will open an ad everytime it is clicked.

You can use this extension for free without any hassle of registration and charges, and if you like it please give a positive feedback.

DISCLAIMER:
This extension is developed on top of Whatsapp application. I am not related/working in that company.
